System overview: A telemedicine service links patient monitoring devices with a cloud analytics dashboard and a mobile clinician app.
Objectives: detect abnormal vital signs, notify clinicians quickly, and keep patient data secure.
Operating environment: home use, variable network connectivity, and mixed device vendors.
Actors: patient, clinician, and IT administrator.
Interfaces: Bluetooth sensors, cloud API, and mobile notifications.
Assumptions: patients charge devices nightly and clinicians acknowledge alerts within 10 minutes.
